item.name: DS_HS
item.sql: select ba.id as id, ba.matraodoi as so_benh_an, bn.idhis as ma_benh_nhan, bn.tendaydu as ten_benh_nhan, bn.diachi as diachi, lba.ten as loai_benh_an, ba.mayte as ma_yte, ba.maluutru as ma_luutru, cd_vv.ma as vaovien_mabenh, cd_vv.ten as vaovien_tenbenh, cd.motachandoankkb as vaovien_mota, cd_rv.ma as ravien_mabenh, cd_rv.ten as ravien_tenbenh, cd.motachandoanravienchinh as ravien_mota, khoa_dt.ten as khoa_ravien, qlnb.ngaygiovaovien as ngay_vaovien, qlnb.ngaygioravien as ngay_ravien, ba.ngaytao as ngay_tiepnhan, nguoitao.username as canbo_tiepnhan, ba.ngaysua as ngay_luutru, nguoisua.username as canbo_luutru, dm_ndl.ten as nguon_dulieu from emr_danh_sach_ho_so_benh_an ba join emr_benh_nhan bn on bn.id = ba.idbenhnhan join emr_dm_loai_benh_an lba on lba.id = ba.idloaibenhan join emr_vao_khoa vk on vk.idhsba=ba.id join emr_dm_khoa_dieu_tri khoa_dt on khoa_dt.id=vk.idkhoadieutri join emr_chan_doan cd on cd.idhsba = ba.id join emr_dm_ma_benh cd_vv on cd_vv.id=cd.idicd_chandoankkb join emr_dm_ma_benh cd_rv on cd_rv.id=cd.idicd_chandoanravienchinh join emr_quan_ly_nguoi_benh qlnb on qlnb.idhsba=ba.id left join users nguoitao on nguoitao.user_id=ba.idnguoitao left join users nguoisua on nguoisua.user_id=ba.idnguoisua join emr_dm_tu_sinh dm_ndl on dm_ndl.id=ba.idnguondulieu where ba.idtrangthai=? [MA_YTE_CHECK]
